fields.name: Select_the_Cabinet_from_the_DataHall
fields.fieldText: Select the Cabinet from the DataHall

fields.name: Select_the_Cage_from_the_DataHall
fields.fieldText: Select the Cage from the DataHall

fields.name: Copy_1_of_FinishedMessage
fields.fieldText:
You successfully have created {!N1_Number_of_Circuit_Breakers} Assets to account for the number of Circuits that we will install for this customer.


Please go back to the CRN to verify this and go through the standard asset assignment process.

fields.name: Message
fields.fieldText:
The DC Circuit contracted under this Service Order was sold under the {!Get_the_Asset_Details.Service_Order_Line_Item__r.Product2.Power_Model__c} model.


As such, we need further input to determine how many DC Circuit Breakers to create to accommodate this Service.

fields.name: SODetails
fields.fieldText:
Given the information from the Service Order (shown below), please indicate how many Circuit Breakers are going to be needed to accomodate this request:

  • Service: {!Get_Service_order_Line_Item_from_Original_Asset.Description}
  • Quantity: {!Get_Service_order_Line_Item_from_Original_Asset.Quantity}

fields.name: Warning
fields.fieldText: * Note: If there service above is " A + B Feeds", please input the TOTAL number of circuits you will need to provide both feeds. (Ex: If you need 10 Circuits per feed, put 20).

fields.name: FinishedMessage
fields.fieldText:
You successfully have created {!Number_of_DC_Circuits} Assets to account for the number of Circuits that we will install for this customer.


Please go back to the CRN to verify this and go through the standard asset assignment process.

fields.name: NoAssetTypeOutputText
fields.fieldText:
There was an issue with the Asset you are attempting to assign.


This Asset doesn't have a proper type to assign, please contact Netrality support team regarding

{!Get_the_Asset_Details.Name}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Message
fields.fieldText:
The Circuit Breakers contracted under this Service Order was sold under the {!Get_the_Asset_Details.Service_Order_Line_Item__r.Product2.Power_Model__c} model.


As such, we need further input to determine how many Circuit Breakers to create to accommodate this Service.

fields.name: Copy_1_of_SODetails
fields.fieldText:
Given the information from the Service Order (shown below), please indicate how many Circuit Breakers are going to be needed to accomodate this request:

  • Service: {!Get_Service_order_Line_Item_from_Original_Asset.Description}
  • Quantity: {!Get_Service_order_Line_Item_from_Original_Asset.Quantity}

fields.name: Copy_1_of_Warning
fields.fieldText: * Note: If there service above is " A + B Feeds", please input the TOTAL number of circuits you will need to provide both feeds. (Ex: If you need 10 Circuits per feed, put 20).

fields.name: panelRUGuidance
fields.fieldText: There are {!Get_the_Asset_Details.Quantity} RUs total, Would you like to split these up?

fields.name: RUErrorMessage
fields.fieldText: The total amount of RUs you selected has to equal {!Get_the_Asset_Details.Quantity}, your total was {!sumOfRUsadded}
